LanguageData.HuskenGrain.label: Husken Grain [IGD]
LanguageData.HuskenGrain.description: Husken Grain is for using windmill. You can get grain flour if you put it next to windmill.
LanguageData.WindMill.label: WindMill
LanguageData.WindMill.description: A Windmill for grind crops. You should place husken grain next to it.
LanguageData.WindMill_Blueprint.label: WindMill (blueprint)
LanguageData.WindMill_Frame.label: WindMill (building)
LanguageData.WindMill_Frame.description: A Windmill for grind crops. You should place husken grain next to it.
LanguageData.Water_Mill.label: Water Mill
LanguageData.Water_Mill.description: A Water mill for producing water.
LanguageData.Water_Mill_Blueprint.label: Water Mill (blueprint)
LanguageData.Water_Mill_Frame.label: Water Mill (building)
LanguageData.Water_Mill_Frame.description: A Water mill for producing water.
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Nutrient.label: 배양액 생산기
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Nutrient.description: 수경재배기를 위한 배양액을 만듭니다. 0~35도를 유지해야 하며 주변에 투입기 설치 후 배양액 원료를 놔둬야 합니다.
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Nutrient_Frame.label: 배양액 생산기 (건설 중)
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Nutrient_Frame.descript: 수경재배기를 위한 배양액을 만듭니다. 0~35도를 유지해야 하며 주변에 투입기 설치 후 배양액 원료를 놔둬야 합니다.
LanguageData.EFertilizerBarrel.label: Electronic Fertilizer Barrel
LanguageData.EFertilizerBarrel.description: A Electronic Fertilizer Barrel for ferment raw fertilizer. It should be 25~100 degree. You should place Raw fertilizer next to it.
LanguageData.EFertilizerBarrel_Blueprint.label: Electronic Fertilizer Barrel (blueprint)
LanguageData.EFertilizerBarrel_Frame.label: Electronic Fertilizer Barrel (building)
LanguageData.EFertilizerBarrel_Frame.description: A Electronic Fertilizer Barrel for ferment raw fertilizer. It should be 25~100 degree. You should place Raw fertilizer next to it.
LanguageData.Salt_Refiner.label: Salt Refiner
LanguageData.Salt_Refiner.description: A Refiner for making Salt. Safety temperature is 0~35. Place Raw salt next to it.
LanguageData.Salt_Refiner_Blueprint.label: Salt Refiner (blueprint)
LanguageData.Salt_Refiner_Frame.label: Salt Refiner (building)
LanguageData.Salt_Refiner_Frame.description: A Refiner for making Salt. Safety temperature is 0~35. Place Raw salt next to it.
